params.itemId: Unique identifier for the captured item
params.url: The source URL to clip from

params.subscriptionId: The subscription where changes were detected

params.itemId: Unique identifier for the captured item
The item to mark as ready

detectChanges(bytes32).notice: Flag that changes have been detected on a subscription

importFile(bytes32,string,string).notice: Import a file as a captured item

itemExists(bytes32).notice: Check whether a capture item exists

markReady(bytes32).notice: Mark a captured item as ready for downstream processing

subscribe(bytes32,bytes32,string,string).notice: Subscribe to a data source for ongoing capture
